ModMetaData.name: Better Architect Menu | No Animal Bedding Subcategory
ModMetaData.author: Kobe Riddle
ModMetaData.description:
Removes the Animal/Bedding subcategory and moves animal bedding to Animals/Ranching.

Also moves Fences to Structure/Walls and the standard fence gate to Structure/Doors. 

Recommended to be used together with Clean Categories Dropdowns: *Extended*.
